descriptionHtml:
Birk Bassison is a slightly taller that average Nord NPC from a poor farmer family. He can be found in Rorikstead. He is a potential husband as well as a battle mage, specialising in destruction and conjuration (though not necromancy).

He starts out at level 40, and will level up with the player.

If there are any problems let me know and I will see if I can fix it.

For anyone who may be wondering, the robes are part of a comprehensive clothing retexture mod which is not required. Retexture by MissObsidienne: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19826
author: Saga
